divs: sighting details1:45 i looked into the north sky by 1:50 i did see a white oval.i called to my partner to look north to my arm finger point.partner got a beed on it.i went for binoculars ( knowing i would loose my site of event ).partner zoomed in as will be seen by documatation submit. no sound .after 10 min lost in the clowds.could it be this *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). ................................................................................................................................................here is why you dont get many reports:i agree to the release of my contact information to third parties[who is the party?] as part of the investigation into my report of a ufo sighting.............................................................................................................................................. i do not agree to the release of my contact information to third parties[who is the party] as part of the investigation into my report of a ufo sighting............................................................................................................................................. i will talk to mufon as for 3rd party, is it local news? is it fed's? is it a alien?................................................................................................................................................you need to change and give a third opt that is clear like :i do not agree to the release of my contact information to third parties that mufon works with not connected to any goverment.
Summary: White North Sky Oval I called to my Partner No Sound Partner Zoomed In as seen documatation Submit Lost In the Clowds by 2pm
